attributes.action: We have no confidence in all Members of Parliament. All should step down.
attributes.background: Members have failed in their duty to represent the people. They should stand down and not receive any further payment from the State

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. That includes asking for people to resign or be sacked. 

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could search for and sign a petition about that:

https://petition.parliament.uk/

If you would like a general election, you might like to sign this petition instead:

Have another general election  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
